name: Mocatie
tagline: Monte Carlo Take it Easy configuration space for mocasinns
body:
### Simulating the board game

Take it Easy is a popular combinatoric board game. In Germany you can [buy it from Ravensburger](http://www.ravensburger.de/shop/spiele/familienspiele/take-it-easy-26362/index.html). This library estimates the probabilities of all possible scores by Wang Landau simulation. It is a configuration space for [mocasinns](https://github.com/bkrueger/mocasinns).

### What works?
* Estimation of the complete Take it Easy score space

### What's to come?
* Partially fixed (in-game) configurations -> what are my chances, if I put this tile here or there?
* Nice graphical output scripts

### Authors and Contributors
* Johannes F. Knauf (@SpeckFleck)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
